DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy of chiropractic manual therapy in infants with excessive crying behaviour. Influence of parental bias in reporting crying behaviour.
DOC.brief_title: Chiropractic Manual Therapy in Infantile Colic
DOC.criteria: Excessive crying, infant less than 8weeks of age, born at gestational age 37 weeks or later, otherwise healthy Not accepted for chiropractic care
